text: [Music]
hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this

but you can add leftover pork and turn

options are endless but let me show you
the base of what you'll need starting
with this cold leftover dry white rice
this is really important that your rice
is cooked and cooled preferably you do
it the day before this is just extra
long grain rice that I've rinsed and
then I just cooked until it was you know
a little bit about dente drain there
really well and popped it in the fridge
overnight it makes the biggest
difference with the texture of your
fried rice if your rice is cold so make
